feed.title: Open Block Chain Licence, BIP[xxxx] Draft

entry.title: Open Block Chain Licence, BIP[xxxx] Draft
entry.summary: The email thread shared above is about a proposed blockchain license to supplement the existing MIT License which currently only covers the core reference client software. The proposal, which is not part of the draft BIP, is available for discussion and evaluation via a Google Drive link. The Creative Commons Zero (CC0) license is also mentioned in passing, as it emulates public domain in jurisdictions where there is no official public domain.
